Dec 9 (Reuters) - Amazon says in a statement: : *STRONGLY DISAGREES WITH ITALY ANTITRUST DECISION, WILL APPEAL *AMAZON SAYS PROPOSED FINE AND REMEDIES BY ITALY ANTITRUST ARE UNJUSTIFIED AND DISPROPORTIONATE

  • (Reporting by Milan newsroom)

((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 09-DEC-202106:59:50.737 GMT
